AlfredWelcome
The main class that starts and runs the application
EditFlashcardsController
Controller class for the Edit Flashcards view.
Flashcard
Represents a single flashcard with a question, an answer, and a mastery status.
FlashcardController
Controller class for the Flashcard view.
IAlfredDAO
Interface for the Alfred Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the application's classes with the database.
MockAlfredDAO
Mock implementation of the AlfredDAO methods that doesn't use the database
OllamaClientController
Controller class for the Ollama Client view.
OllamaService
Service class responsible for interacting with the Ollama AI API to generate flashcards based on a given topic.

A class representing a daily quiz, with a list of the quiz's questions, the quiz's result and its villain's ID

A controller for the quiz page functionalities
QuizQuestion
A class representing a single quiz question, with the question, correct answer and user entered answer

A controller for the quiz results page functionalities

A class that implements the IAlfredDAO methods with the database
